item.title: Bringing Together the Perfect Modern Farmhouse Design
item.description: We recently completed a modern farmhouse in Oak Forest that may be one of our favorite projects this year! The home started as an inventory home but was purchased mid-construction turning the adorable 4 bedroom, 3.5 bath family home into a semi-custom job. With modern farmhouse style continuing to grow in popularity, take a look below for tips from our team on capturing this style. Five Tips for Achieving the Modern Farmhouse Lookâ€¦
